ComicInfo.Title: When the Walls Fell Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: In its escape from the Delta Quadrant, theU.S.S. Theseushas landed in an unknown sector of space that appears safer-if not a hundred years younger-than their own. There, the crew receive a signal from an oncoming ship: theU.S.S. Enterprise. Captain James T. Kirk is hailing. The two crews join together in the race against Lore's wave of destruction, convinced there must be some countermeasure that will save their universes from complete annihilation. But will their combined bravery and brainpower be enough? Or is it already too late for both their timelines?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-21 00:30:01. [CVDB1078619]
ComicInfo.Characters: Benjamin Sisko, Data, Descheeni, Dr. Beverly Crusher, Hikaru Sulu, James T. Kirk, Keenser, Leonard McCoy, Lily Sato, Montgomery Scott, Nyota Uhura, Pavel Chekov, Science Officer 0718, Spock, T'Lir, Tom Paris
ComicInfo.Teams: Enterprise A Crew, Starfleet, USS Theseus Crew
